Subscribe. Welcome to Screen & Beyond! Our channel is dedicated to bringing you the best in celebrity highlights and movie trailers, all crafted with a deep respect for copyright laws. We strictly adhere to the principles of fair use under US copyright law, ensuring that our content is legal and respectful to the original creators.

We strictly follow YouTube's guidelines, ensuring our channel remains within YouTube's policies. Our trailer mashups and celebrity highlights are crafted to ignite excitement for upcoming releases, complementing official movie trailers. These works are considered derivative under the United States Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. § 101, and are protected under the fair use doctrine. 

If you are a copyright holder and believe any of our content infringes on your rights, don’t hesitate to contact us, and we will address your concerns promptly.

For any enquiries, Copyrights, or suggestions, kindly contact us at: nutrifitbliss@gmail.com
